# For every system generate thrift libraries
yarp_idl_to_dir("${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/thrift/WearData.thrift"
                "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/autogenerated/data"
                THRIFT_SOURCES
                THRIFT_HEADERS
                THRIFT_INCLUDE_DIRS)

add_library(wear_idl STATIC ${THRIFT_SOURCES}
                            ${THRIFT_HEADERS})

target_include_directories(wear_idl SYSTEM PUBLIC ${THRIFT_INCLUDE_DIRS}
                                                  ${YARP_INCLUDE_DIRS})

target_link_libraries(wear_idl YARP::YARP_OS)

install(TARGETS wear_idl
        RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_BINDIR}
        ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_LIBDIR}
        LIBRARY DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_FULL_LIBDIR})
